title: Asynchronous Discussion Design to Enhance Learner Agency in Digital Game-Based Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical problem-solving skills and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Designing asynchronous group discussion activities to promote learner agency in digital game-based learning environments for current professionals

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design and execute discussion topics in a digital game-based learning environment.
Learners can generate 20 or more higher-order thinking questions (based on Bloom's taxonomy) through asynchronous group discussions.
During discussion participation, learners can recognize their learning autonomy and develop three or more learning strategies that reflect it.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
